lines.text: Ooh, ooh! That guy gives me a terrible headache! Joe, Joe, get me an aspirin. Here put it on a slice of bread. I'm hungry too!

[to Krivoc]
Well, you look familiar. I just can't place the graveyard!

[about to be stabbed]
Wait! May I make one last request?

[to Sterorius]
Yeah, well, there's a body here somewhere, and I'm gonna find it.
All right, come on, produce the corpus delicti.
One thing at a time. Produce the body first.
What a revoltin' development this is!
Run? Do you think I'm yellow?
You don't realize death is staring you in the face!

[about Valentine]
When that anteater buries his nose in the pillow, it leaves an impression on the mattress.
